com.riskgame.service

Class StartupPhase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.riskgame.service.StartupPhase

  • public class StartupPhase
extends java.lang.Object
    StartupPhase class is for the beginning of the game play. Its contains methods which will take the details from the players, and randomly assign the countries to the them. Armies allocation will happen to the players as per the Conquest game rule.
    Author:
    Anusha, Shresthi, Nikitha

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StartupPhase()

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void allocationOfArmyToCountriesInitially(GameMapGraph mapGraph)
      Method to assign armies to the countries so that each country will get at least one army as per the conquest game rule.
      void allocationOfArmyToPlayers()
      Method to assign the number of armies to the players which differs based on the players count.
      void allocationOfCountry(GameMapGraph mapGraph)
      Method to assign countries to the players.
      void allocationOfRemainingArmyToCountries()
      Method for armies assignment to the countries so that the number of armies in the countries will be balanced

      This method starts the game, obtaining the number of payers , details and initializing them.

      • allocationOfCountry

        public void allocationOfCountry(GameMapGraph mapGraph)
        Method to assign countries to the players. Random allocation of countries to the players will happen in this method.

      • allocationOfArmyToPlayers

        public void allocationOfArmyToPlayers()
        Method to assign the number of armies to the players which differs based on the players count. Army allocation is done as per the conquest game rule.
